meanings.definition: In a manner that relates to the voice or speaking.
meanings.sent1: She spoke vocally during the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The singer performed vocally at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The parrot vocally imitated her words.
meanings.sent4: His guitar sang vocally in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The wind howled vocally through the trees.

meanings.definition: Using the voice to produce sound.
meanings.sent1: He vocally sang his favorite song.
meanings.sent2: The actor vocally delivered his lines on stage.
meanings.sent3: The cat vocally meowed for attention.
meanings.sent4: The engine roared vocally as it started.
meanings.sent5: The bird chirped vocally in the morning.

meanings.definition: Expressing opinions or feelings openly and confidently.
meanings.sent1: She is a vocally supportive friend.
meanings.sent2: The politician was vocally against the new law.
meanings.sent3: The dog was vocally excited to see its owner.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the sunset were vocally beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The waves crashed vocally against the shore.
